rules_text:
Interlink with Noah, Ouroboros Off-Seer [i](You can have both creatures be your commanders. Melds with that creature.)[/i]
Whenever Mio deals combat damage to a player, look at the top X cards of your library where X is the number of tapped creatures you control. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
